docs.snippet: Experience is the top priority for choosing the next coach of South Korea's national football team, the new head of the KFA's technical committee said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Experience is the top priority for choosing the next coach of South Korea's national football team, the new head of the KFA's technical committee said on Monday.

headline.main: Experience the Key for Next South Korea Coach- KFA
headline.print_headline: Experience the Key for Next South Korea Coach- KFA

docs.snippet: The music service announced the milestone on Tuesday as it seeks to expand its footprint in Europe and Latin America.
docs.lead_paragraph: The music service announced the milestone on Tuesday as it seeks to expand its footprint in Europe and Latin America.

docs.snippet: Luiz Felipe Scolari was named coach of Gremio on Tuesday only three weeks after leading Brazil to their most embarrassing World Cup result, a record-equalling 7-1 defeat against Germany.    "
docs.lead_paragraph: Luiz Felipe Scolari was named coach of Gremio on Tuesday only three weeks after leading Brazil to their most embarrassing World Cup result, a record-equalling 7-1 defeat against Germany.    "

headline.main: Scolari Makes Quick Return to Coaching at Old Club Gremio
headline.print_headline: Scolari Makes Quick Return to Coaching at Old Club Gremio

docs.snippet: Paraguay's Nacional reached the Libertadores Cup final for the first time with a 2-1 aggregate victory over Defensor Sporting on Tuesday, the visitors bravely holding on to advance despite losing 1-0 in Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Paraguay's Nacional reached the Libertadores Cup final for the first time with a 2-1 aggregate victory over Defensor Sporting on Tuesday, the visitors bravely holding on to advance despite losing 1-0 in Uruguay.

headline.main: Nacional Cling On to Reach First Libertadores Cup Final
headline.print_headline: Nacional Cling On to Reach First Libertadores Cup Final

docs.snippet: Steven Gerrard says the slip that arguably ended Liverpool's title hopes and England being knocked out the World Cup in the group stages have contributed to what has been "probably the worst three months of my life".
docs.lead_paragraph: Steven Gerrard says the slip that arguably ended Liverpool's title hopes and England being knocked out the World Cup in the group stages have contributed to what has been "probably the worst three months of my life".

headline.main: Gerrard Says Last Three Months 'Worst of My Life'
headline.print_headline: Gerrard Says Last Three Months 'Worst of My Life'

docs.snippet: Thirty-two countries have written to a U.N. General Assembly committee asking the United Nations to recognize Judaism's holiest day, Yom Kippur, as an official holiday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Thirty-two countries have written to a U.N. General Assembly committee asking the United Nations to recognize Judaism's holiest day, Yom Kippur, as an official holiday.

headline.main: 32 Nations Back Judaism's Yom Kippur as UN Holiday
headline.print_headline: 32 Nations Back Judaism's Yom Kippur as UN Holiday

docs.snippet: Stixx Williams, who died last week while playing in a summer league basketball game at Baruch College, was known as a friend to both professional players and troubled teenagers in New York.
docs.lead_paragraph: Stixx Williams, who died last week while playing in a summer league basketball game at Baruch College, was known as a friend to both professional players and troubled teenagers in New York.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column remembers James Williams, known as Stixx, friend to both NBA players and troubled teens who collapsed and died while playing in a summer league basketball game at Baruch College; worked as a counselor at New York juvenile detention center.

headline.seo: Stixx Williams, a Summer League Basketball Star, Is Mourned

docs.snippet: Liverpool, which beat Manchester City on penalty kicks at Yankee Stadium, has had to compensate for the departure of forward Luis Suárez.
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool, which beat Manchester City on penalty kicks at Yankee Stadium, has had to compensate for the departure of forward Luis Suárez.
docs.abstract: Liverpool defeats Manchester City on penalty kicks, 3-1, after English Premier soccer teams play to 2-2 draw at Yankee Stadium.

headline.main: Despite the Loss of a Star, Liverpool Is Hoping to Build on Its Success
headline.print_headline: Despite the Loss of a Star, Liverpool Is Hoping to Build on Its Success

docs.snippet: Barcelona defender Gerard Pique believes an "angry" Luis Suarez will be desperate to prove himself when he has served out a four-month ban for a biting incident at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona defender Gerard Pique believes an "angry" Luis Suarez will be desperate to prove himself when he has served out a four-month ban for a biting incident at the World Cup.

headline.main: Barcelona's Pique Relishing Return of 'Angry' Suarez
headline.print_headline: Barcelona's Pique Relishing Return of 'Angry' Suarez

docs.snippet: Argentina's debt default threatens to worsen trade tensions in South America, adding to the economic woes of Brazil in a tense election year and causing headaches in Uruguay as the Argentine economy looks likely to plunge deeper into recession.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina's debt default threatens to worsen trade tensions in South America, adding to the economic woes of Brazil in a tense election year and causing headaches in Uruguay as the Argentine economy looks likely to plunge deeper into recession.

headline.main: Argentine Default to Hit Brazil Factories, Uruguay Resorts
headline.print_headline: Argentine Default to Hit Brazil Factories, Uruguay Resorts
